top_comments.comment: I will hear this everyday from now on....I am in love with the amount of knowledge in this video.....no words...... absolutely amazing ❤️
I loved this.. This is so beautiful ❤ ❤ ❤ Thank you gurudev ❤️

comments_since_last_sample.body:
Gurudev
Great talk. Can't express my feelings. Wish I could sit there all throughout my life and keep listening. 
You physical body, mind etc are all connected to the total consciousness.
I felt this truth from the time I met you first.
Being total consciousness  and very compassionate can you not transform the world into more friendly happy family sooner .
Thank you so much for this sharing 🙏
also be aware of someone which gives you an answer to everything, like sadghuru wrongly is worshiped like a idol, making up stories about shiva which exists in no scriptute.

Beautiful eye opening ng explanation on the ability of cognising by brain.
When highly intelligent and people with good common sense asks Gurudev the answers we get from HIM and mind blowing and phenomenal.
Loving each and every aspect of AGA session with Gurudev . What we might have missed due to loss of lockdown satsangs are coming through to us . Wowo brilliant to hear these from Gurudev as always  opening so many dimensions .
I will hear this everyday from now on....I am in love with the amount of knowledge in this video.....no words...... absolutely amazing ❤️
This knowledge, to which you have opened our eyes , is absolutely phenomenal Gurudev! Heartfelt Gratitude and Pranam to your holy feet🙏🏼💐
I loved this.. This is so beautiful ❤ ❤ ❤ Thank you gurudev ❤️
